1.text: Gather 3 people and a deck of playing cards with the jokers removed.

2.text: Roll a die to select the dealer for the first hand.

3.text: Deal 13 cards to yourself if you’re the dealer and 12 to the others.

4.text: Place the remaining cards face down in the center of the table.

5.text: Draw a card from the deck at the center of the table.

6.text: Expose a meld if you have one by placing it face up on the table.

7.text: Lay off 1 or more cards on exposed melds to play cards you can’t use in new melds.

8.text: Discard a card at the end of your turn.

9.text: Repeat the sequence on each of your turns.

10.text: Tally up your points if the stock pile is exhausted.

11.text: Play all of your cards and call out “Tongit” to win during your turn.

12.text: Call “draw” on your turn if you think you have the lowest points total.

13.text: Earn chips for your accomplishments during the game.
